name: Pixel Hero V2
description:
A small continuation of my Epic Games Megajam submission. I will continue posting updates on this project upload, as I don't want to mess with the integrity of the game jam. I added in some lighting elements, and an additional mechanic. I also set the flipbook groundwork for future enemy additions once I learn how to script AI. This project was developed using blueprints in Unreal Engine 5.

Controls for Version 2:

Arrow keys: Movement

Jump: space

Attack: C key

Slide: V key

Controls for Version 3:

Menu navigation: mouse

Arrow keys: Movement

Jump: space

Attack: C key

Slide: V key

1: deal damage
